      • chooseAnnotationsPlaceNoUi

        public ExternalAnnotationsManager.AnnotationPlace chooseAnnotationsPlaceNoUi(PsiElement element)
        Overrides:
        chooseAnnotationsPlaceNoUi in class BaseExternalAnnotationsManager
        Parameters:
        element - element to add new annotation for
        Returns:
        place where the annotation must be added. No UI is displayed, so can be called inside any read-action. May return ExternalAnnotationsManager.AnnotationPlace.NEED_ASK_USER if the user confirmation is necessary.

      • chooseAnnotationsPlace

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        element - element to add new annotation for
        Returns:
        place where the annotation must be added. Must be called in EDT.
